oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-11-11 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Aired performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program, staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), Kenyon Brown (producer). Performances feature Hiram Higsby (announcer), the Homegrown Trio (performers), Lem Hawkins (performer), Dick and Mary Lou (performers), and Chuck Davis (performer) on November 11, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Homegrown Trio; Mary Lou; Lem Hawkins; Chuck Davis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke / (0:57) Lem Hawkins performs "[Unidentified banjo tune]" / (2:30) The Homegrown Trio performs "Down In The Valley" / (4:41) Hiram Higsby tells a joke with Allan Page and Mary Lou is introduced / (5:28) Mary Lou performs "Swing Time Cowgirl" / (8:17) Hiram Higsby tells a joke to Allan Page and Lem Hawkins is introduced / (9:14) Lem Hawkins performs "Give My Love To Nell" / (11:36) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (11:40) Dick Reinhart and Mary Lou perform "Crying Holy Unto The Lord" / (13:07) Hiram Higsby talks / (13:14) Closing Theme and statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975;
